description.value:
Potion, rare
A wafer of warmth is a small biscuit that can be eaten in just one or two bites. It always feels warm, as if it just came out of the oven. The wafer has no nutritional value but for 1 hour after eating it, you have resistance to cold damage and have advantage when making saving throws against the effects of a cold environment.
